title: A new mechanism for visible light photocatalysis: generation of intraband by adsorbed organic compounds with wide-bandgap semiconductors
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00151F, Paper
Teng Wang, Jiachun Cao, Juan Li, Juntian Li, Didi Li, Shaobin Wang, Zhimin Ao
A novel mechanism has been revealed by the study that the adsorption of VOC molecules on the surface of semiconductors formed midgap states between the ground state of the VOCs and the conduction band of the semiconductor.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
